backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Keep my Calendar up to date by committing to only meetings that are part of my priorities.

gutts.name: Retrieve Calendar Events
gutts.capability: Access and fetch all scheduled calendar events from the user's calendar system
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the system has the latest view of all meetings and events
gutts.evidence: Implementation uses Google Calendar API to pull events with OAuth authentication

gutts.name: Extract Event Attributes
gutts.capability: Parse each event to extract key details such as title, time, participants, and description
gutts.user_goal: Enable downstream analysis of meeting relevance and priority
gutts.evidence: JSON response from calendar API is parsed to extract event metadata fields

gutts.name: Retrieve User Priority Profile
gutts.capability: Access and load the user's defined priorities or priority model
gutts.user_goal: Provide a reference for determining which meetings align with user priorities
gutts.evidence: System queries user preference store to retrieve priority categories and rules

gutts.name: Classify Event Against Priorities
gutts.capability: Determine if each event aligns with the user's stated priorities
gutts.user_goal: Identify which meetings should be committed to based on user priorities
gutts.evidence: NLP model scores event description against priority keywords and returns binary relevance

gutts.name: Filter Non-Priority Events
gutts.capability: Separate events that do not match the user's priorities from those that do
gutts.user_goal: Ensure only relevant meetings are considered for commitment
gutts.evidence: System applies boolean filter to event list based on classification results

gutts.name: Commit Priority Meetings
gutts.capability: Update the calendar to confirm attendance for meetings identified as priority
gutts.user_goal: Keep the calendar accurate by committing to relevant meetings
gutts.evidence: API call updates event RSVP status to 'accepted' for priority meetings
